amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate both the Environmental Quality Technology Research account and the management support to accompany that research under the Department of the Army by striking the funding in the amount of $25,798,000 and applying the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional Record to transfer $25,798,000 from Research Development, Test and Evaluation to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
